suggestions.feeding: Regular feeding times are important for pet health. Adjust portions based on food type.
suggestions.vetVisit: Vet visits are essential for maintaining pet health. Don't forget regular checkups.
suggestions.vaccination: Vaccinations help keep your pet protected. Schedule reminders ahead of time.
suggestions.medication: Medication schedules work best with consistent timing and dosage notes.
suggestions.exercise: Regular exercise is important for your pet's physical and mental health. Choose age-appropriate activities.
suggestions.grooming: Regular grooming is necessary for your pet's cleanliness and health. Don't forget fur, nail and dental care.
suggestions.play: Playtime is a great way to bond with your pet and get exercise.
suggestions.training: Training sessions are important for your pet's learning and socialization. Progress with patience and rewards.
suggestions.bath: Bathing is necessary for your pet's cleanliness. Adjust frequency based on pet type.
suggestions.default: This activity is important for your pet's health and happiness. Schedule regularly.

upcomingEvents.noUpcomingMessage: There are no upcoming events at the moment

notifications.enableDescription: Never miss important pet care reminders
notifications.enablePrompt: Enable notifications to receive pet care reminders
notifications.benefit3: Medication times and daily care notifications
notifications.testBody: Notifications are set up. We'll remind you about pet care events.

network.noConnection: No internet connection. Please check your connection.

settings.notificationDisableInfo: You can disable notifications from your device settings. We'll stop scheduling new reminders from here.

feedingSchedule.title: Feeding Schedules
feedingSchedule.subtitle: Set up a feeding schedule for your pet
feedingSchedule.daysHelp: Select days when this feeding schedule should be active
feedingSchedule.isActiveHelp: Toggle to activate or deactivate this schedule

suggestions.dryFood: Recommended: 2-3 times daily. Measure portions based on pet's weight and age.
suggestions.wetFood: Recommended: 1-2 times daily. Store opened cans in refrigerator.
suggestions.rawFood: Recommended: 1-2 times daily. Ensure proper handling and storage.
suggestions.homemade: Recommended: Consult vet for balanced nutrition. Portion based on recipe.
suggestions.treats: Recommended: No more than 10% of daily calories. Use for training.
suggestions.supplements: Recommended: Follow vet's instructions for dosage and timing.
suggestions.default: Consult your veterinarian for specific feeding recommendations.

errors.submitFailed: Failed to save feeding schedule. Please try again.

delete.title: Delete Schedule
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this feeding schedule?
